messages.subject: Hugs for soldiers
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, I have a friend who has a son in Kuwait right now and she passed this along to me, I thought some of your children might enjoy making pictures
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone, I have a friend who has a son in Kuwait right now and she passed this along to me, I thought some of your children might enjoy making pictures or writing to some of the soldiers to cheer them up a bit. She has told me that some of the soldiers don't receive mail, and her son has said that the letters from home are the only things keeping some of them sane, even though they don't know us. They need our support!!

http://groups.msn.com/hugstokuwaitadoptasoldier

Heather


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
